name: Soundspacestation
0:
”Alexa, open sound space station”
”Alexa, pause”
”Alexa, resume”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sound space station
Developer Terms of Use
des:
• SOUND SPACE STATION •
Sound space station is an Alexa skill designed to help you unwind and de-stress whenever you need it. With a wide range of calming sounds, including nature sounds, white noise, and ambient music, you can find the perfect soundscape to suit your mood. Whether you're trying to meditate, focus, or simply escape from the distractions of daily life.

• FUNCTIONALITIES •
Sound space station reproduces relaxing audio tracks that will help you sleep better. 

The PREMIUM EDITION includes: 
- More and longer audio tracks.
- Higher quality audio.
- No interruptions.

• ALEXA ROUTINES •
To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:
- Enable this Alexa skill.
- On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
- Click + to add a new routine.
- Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
- Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
- Choose "Your Skills".
- Select this skill.
- Click Next.
- Choose Device to perform the routine to.
- Click Save.

• THANK YOU! •
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
